Articles.Content:
Will Kerbal Space Program run well on AMD Ryzen 5 3400g with Radeon Vega 11 Graphics APU? Without a separate graphics card with, 16GB DDR4 2400MHz RAM; 500GB M.2 NVMe SSD; Asus EX-A320M Motherboard?

Edited June 29, 2021 by Infinity and Beyond

Try it and see?

I see no reason why it would ‘t work, though you might need to turn some graphics features down/off due to the lack of a dedicated GPU.
I’m guessing it should work great assuming you aren’t using any mods. My computer’s specs are garbage and Kerbal runs quite well even with quite a lot of mods.
